title: Create a Type Safe REST API
description: Create a Type Safe REST API

name.x-prompt: What would you like your API to be called? e.g. MyApi

modelLanguage.description: The language you would like to model your api in.
modelLanguage.x-prompt: What language would you like to use to model your API?

infrastructureLanguage.description: The language you would like to write your infrastructure in.
infrastructureLanguage.x-prompt: What language are you using to write CDK infrastructure?

handlerLanguages.description: The languages you would like to write lambda handlers in.
handlerLanguages.x-prompt: What languages (if any) would you like to write lambda handlers in?

libraries.description: The libraries to generate from your API
libraries.x-prompt: What libraries would you like to generate?

runtimeLanguages.description: The languages you would like to write client or server code in, in addition to the infrastructure or handler languages.
runtimeLanguages.x-prompt: What other languages (if any) would you like to write client or server code in?

directory.description: Parent directory where the api model is placed.
directory.x-prompt: Which directory do you want to create the project in?

scope.description: Scope for API packages, e.g. @my-company. If omitted this will be inferred
scope.x-prompt: What namespace would you like your library to have? i.e: @myapi

subDirectory.description: The sub directory the API is placed in. By default this is the API name.
subDirectory.x-prompt: Which sub directory do you want to create the API in? (By default this is the API name)
